casebody.data:
THE RECTOR, ETC., OF THE CHURCH OF THE REDEEMER, Plaintiff, v. JAMES T. CRAWFORD, Defendant. Upon a verdict directed for the plaintiff, and case and exceptions ordered to Tbe heard in the first instance at G-eneral Term.

Before Monell, Sedgwick, and Van Vorst, JJ.

Decided February 1, 1873. Charles M. Marsh, for plaintiff. James H. Hill, for defendant. Judgment ordered on the verdict.

Opinion by Sedgwick, J. Monell and Van Vorst, JJ., concurred.
